name: Maximalist - Episode 1
description:
Play as Chad Von Mises, a Bitcoin Maximalist who helps the town of Alameda get liberated from villainouscreatures inspired by popular NFT characters.  This game is a 2D platformer where the main character dematerializes monsters and collects Bitcoin.  It is heavily inspired by Megaman and other classic platformers.

This game contains one episode / one level.  Future episodes will depend on the success of this episode.  Thank you for you generous support. Long Live Bitcoin!

--- Installation ---


Mac And Windows  Installation:
 - Unzip Downloaded Zip File
 - Use The Unarchiver or other unzipping apps to properly extract the game from the downloaded ZIP file.  
- Unidentified Developer Issue can be solved in System Preferences -> Privacy and Settings -> Allow Maximalist (Mac)
- Windows Defender -> More Info -> Run Anyway
